Markets gird for volatility as Taiwan heads to voteInvestors are bracing for a volatile reception to Taiwan's election on Feb. 3, with added focus on the island's chip sector, after China said the poll was a choice between peace and war. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 04:02:04 GMT RE6SH4GVP5OVTDV3OAB4K3N7BE https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/markets-girdle-volatility-taiwan-heads-vote-2024-01-11/Ankur Banerjee市场亚洲市场
U.S. says fuel shipment to Philippines coordinated with authoritiesThe U.S. embassy in Manila confirmed on Thursday that the U.S. delivered fuel from one of its naval bases in Hawaii to a facility inside a former U.S. base in the Philippines in coordination with the government. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 03:51:28 GMT AN6TWQ3SJZLANDNUW4CSBEMFG4 https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/us-says-fuel-shipments-to-the-philippines-cooperative-with-authorities-2024-01-11/Reuters商业活力
Asia stocks gain ahead of US CPI, Nikkei breaches 35,000Asian stocks rose on Thursday ahead of U.S. inflation data that could influence the Federal Reserve's thinking on rate cuts, while the crypto world got a boost after exchange-traded funds (ETFs) to track bitcoin were approved in the United States. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 02:42:03 GMT NOES3KYSRBKSFECFT3LDEZQ3CA https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-market-wrapup-1-2024-01-11/Ankur Banerjee市场
Hewlett Packard Enterprise CEO expects no China challenge on $14 billion Juniper Networks dealHewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) Chief Executive Antonio Neri told Reuters he does not foresee any major regulatory risks in China for his firm's $14 billion bid to acquire Juniper Networks . Thu, 11 Jan 2024 01:47:46 GMT BVEQZ4K5GVLBBDF6LUPXFMF6IU https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/hewlett-packard-enterprise-ceo-expects-no-china-challenge-14-billion-juniper-2024-01-11/Stephen Nellis市场交易
Yen lags while dollar waits on US CPIThe yen was squeezed on Thursday, weighed by sluggish Japanese wages, while the dollar was becalmed as traders waited on U.S. inflation data to see whether bets on rate cuts were justified. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 01:10:23 GMT J4EJ7XK3EZK5HFBCN7L22ELH44 https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/yen-lags-while-dollar-waits-us-cpi-2024-01-11/Tom Westbrook市场货币
China warns Taiwan ruling party presidential candidate is dangerousChina on Thursday said it hopes the majority of Taiwanese "make the right choice" ahead of pivotal elections, warning of the "extreme danger" of Taiwan's ruling party presidential candidate Lai Ching-te in triggering cross-strait conflict. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 00:57:00 GMT SLD6WAVHUJNR5BPIYTAVJTTRAQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-warns-taiwan-ruling-party-presidential-candidate-over-possible-2024-01-11/Ryan Woo, James Pomfret世界中国
